name: Murder Mystery (RedOrange)
description:
( This game was made for the Ben Bonk Game Jam #1, with the theme : Trust No One. )

I was having a dinner party with other 16 guests. But suddenly one of the guests died...

There is a  murderer among us!

Gather the clues from other suspects and cctv cameras to find out who the murderer really is. But should you trust all of them?

 -The murderer's identity will be randomized each game-
